text: We need such memories. So we ask you to go back there on a great plan we have. 'Go back?' gasped Flor.'Yes. We plan to attack the Heavy World. You must help to lead our force.' The long afternoon of eternity wore on, that long golden road of an afternoon that would somewhere lead to everlasting night.

The long afternoon of eternity wore on, that long golden road of an afternoon that would somewhere lead to everlasting night.
